data.lyric:
[ti:(There's No Place Like) Home for the Holidays]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Santa's Secret]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00](There's No Place Like) Home for the Holidays - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)
[00:02.04]Lyrics by：Perry Como
[00:04.08]Composed by：Perry Como
[00:06.12]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[00:14.37]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[00:22.97]When you pine for the sunshine of a friendly gaze
[00:31.42]For the holidays you can't beat home sweet home
[00:41.95]I met a man who lives in Tennessee
[00:46.57]He was headin' for Pennsylvania and some home made pumpkin pie
[00:55.45]From Pennsylvania folks are travelin' down to Dixie's sunny shore
[01:02.67]From Atlantic to Pacific gee the traffic is terrific
[01:08.78]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[01:16.04]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[01:22.51]If you want to be happy in a million ways
[01:29.28]For the holidays you can't beat home sweet home
[01:36.28]Take a bus take a train go and hop an aeroplane
[01:39.55]Put the wife and kiddies in the family car
[01:42.86]For the pleasure that you bring when you make that doorbell ring
[01:46.58]No trip could be too far
[01:49.00]I met a man who lives in Tennessee
[01:53.85]He was headin' for Pennsylvania and some home made pumpkin pie
[02:00.62]Some pumpkin pie
[02:02.30]From Pennsylvania folks are travelin' down to Dixie's sunny shore
[02:09.11]From Atlantic to Pacific gee the traffic is terrific
[02:15.89]Oh there's no place like home for the holidays
[02:22.59]'Cause no matter how far away you roam
[02:29.15]If you want to be a happy in a million ways
[02:35.86]For the holidays you can't beat home sweet home
[02:42.59]For the holidays you can't beat home sweet home
data.trans:
[ti:(There's No Place Like) Home for the Holidays]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Santa's Secret]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:02.04]//
[00:04.08]//
[00:06.12]在这个节日里没有比家更温暖的地方
[00:14.37]因为不管你在多远的地方徘徊
[00:22.97]当你渴望得到一个友好的目光
[00:31.42]在这个节日里你无与伦比温暖的家
[00:41.95]我遇见一个住在田纳西州的男人
[00:46.57]他准备去宾夕法尼亚吃点自制南瓜饼
[00:55.45]人们从宾夕法尼亚州来到迪克西阳光明媚的海滩
[01:02.67]从大西洋到太平洋天哪交通太好了
[01:08.78]在这个节日里没有比家更温暖的地方
[01:16.04]因为不管你在多远的地方徘徊
[01:22.51]如果你想快乐无比
[01:29.28]在这个节日里你无与伦比温暖的家
[01:36.28]坐公交坐火车坐飞机
[01:39.55]把妻儿放在家里的车里
[01:42.86]因为当你按响门铃时你给我带来的快乐
[01:46.58]再远的旅程也不为过
[01:49.00]我遇见一个住在田纳西州的男人
[01:53.85]他准备去宾夕法尼亚吃点自制南瓜饼
[02:00.62]南瓜派
[02:02.30]人们从宾夕法尼亚州来到迪克西阳光明媚的海滩
[02:09.11]从大西洋到太平洋天哪交通太好了
[02:15.89]在这个节日里没有比家更温暖的地方
[02:22.59]因为不管你在多远的地方徘徊
[02:29.15]如果你想成为一个幸福的人
[02:35.86]在这个节日里你无与伦比温暖的家
[02:42.59]在这个节日里你无与伦比温暖的家
